title: Destroy
description: Destroys a specific player, it stops the currect music, in case of player.play, it will create another player.
observations: This is a function from the [createPlayer](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/createPlayer.md)/[getPlayer](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/getPlayer.md) functions. You **will** need one of them for use this function.
